body.name: Eyebrow Razor for Women Face Dermaplane Shaving Tool for Men & Women, Face Razor for Peach Fuzz and Hair Removal, 4pcs Replacement Blades Available
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Sharp Japanese Blade: The blades are made from finest stainless steel. The professional eyebrow shaving blade is sharp enough to provide smooth eyebrow shaping. Dermaplane razor for women face easy to use, sharp but gentle.
Anti-allergic Effect: The surface of the blade is treated with Teflon making it hypoallergenic.

Safe and Precise to Use: Blade is designed with a macro mesh pattern, which removes eyebrow and lip hair. It is not easy to scratch the skin making it safe to use, and suitable for wide applications. Suitable for different eyebrow shapes. The precision shaver blades easily removes unwanted hair on all area’s of the face whether it’s the forehead, cheeks, lips and chin.
Washable: The blade is not dull, does not rust, and is more durable.Do not worry about sensitive skin.

Easy to Use & Portable Size: The eyebrow razors are small and lightweight, It can be carried with you when you are traveling. Mini design makes it easy to safely transport the razor in any purse, pocket, bag so it is there to use whenever a touch-up is required. Quickly remove any facial hair in minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost don't buy a razor if it's not Sharp with that being said these are Sharp and anyone who complains about that should just go to an expert. I wanted to try these razors because I have a really hard time using the typical flat ones and I really enjoyed using this. Even being careful it's easy to cut yourself with any razor, I would highly recommend using a good face oil to not only prep the area that you're going to shave but also to put on the blade before and after you use a good oil will help the blade move smoothly over your skin and it will also help prevent bacteria from getting into the follicles after being shaved. The oil will also help keep your blades clean and from rust. I use a jojoba oil but I'm sure all of oil or whatever else people use would work just fine. I also like the flat ones that are being offered on here as well because they're long. I recently noticed that I have tiny white hairs around the openings of my nose and around allergy season my nose won't stop itching so I started shaving them and it's helped a lot I bought these for my eyebrows but I tried using them on my nose and I absolutely love how these work more than the typical flat ones. The long ones I use on the peach fuzz above my lip. I'm glad I tried these out I definitely will get more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp, small and easy
reviews.reviewText: TL/DR: get them, they're awesome.I'm constantly looking for the best facial razors. I've worked long and hard to grow my brows and I only pluck hair that's never going to fit the right shape. However, to shape my brows, I need a small, sharp, easy to use razor. And that is remarkably hard to find. However, these razors are fantastic. I use a stellar brow and lash formula that's so good I grow peach fuzz on my eyelids and beneath my lower lashes. The t-shaped razor is amazing for not only fitting into tight spaces to precisely shape my brows, it's sharp enough to get the peach fuzz so everything is soooooo smooth. The straight razor is fantastic as well. I have A LOT of peach fuzz and it took all of it off with one pass. I strongly recommend using a non-irritating hyaluronic acid to help the blades glide across your face because they're so sharp, it's easy to end up cutting yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Razors those little hairs
reviews.reviewText: Great tool while I am using Ulike IPL. Gets all the little hairs precisely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for women anymore…,
reviews.reviewText: A few words to my bearded brethren who, like me, have those tricky places on your face the usual razors and shavers can’t maintain. I’ve found these eyebrow razors are great for trimming the ‘stache away from the nostrils, catching the corners and edges where mustache meets beard, around the soul patch, etc. (with or without shaving cream, if you’re careful). In my humble opinion, a handy tool to have around even if it never touches your eyebrows. Fear not the “feminine” colors; be secure in your masculinity.
